Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > CADKernel > Core

References

   
Module CADKernel
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Datasmith/CADKernel/Base/Public/Core/Database.h
Include #include "Core/Database.h"

Syntax

class FDatabase

Variables

  Type Name Description
TArray< TSharedPtr< FEntity > > ArchiveEntities Array (use as a Map>) of all the entities of an archive Each Entity is at the index of AchiveId in the array
TArray< TArray< FEntity ** > > ArchiveIdToWaitingPointers  
TArray< TArray< TSharedPtr< FEntity > * > > ArchiveIdToWaitingSharedPointers Array (use as a MapTArray*>>) Some Entity reference an other Entities (with a TSharedPtr).
TArray< TArray< TWeakPtr< FEntity > * > > ArchiveIdToWaitingWeakPointers  
TArray< FIdent > AvailableIdents Recycling of the Id to avoid fragmented idents
bool bForceSpawning  
bool bIsRecursiveSerialization  
TArray< TSharedPtr< FEntity > > DatabaseEntities Array (use as a Map>) of all the entities create during the session Each Entity.Id is the index of the entity in the array
TSet< FIdent > EntitiesToBeSerialized Dedicated to SerializeSelection. Set of entity Ids needed to be saved
uint32 EntityCount  
TSharedPtr< FModel > Model Root Geometry Entity node
TQueue< FIdent > NotYetSerialized Dedicated to SerializeSelection. Queue of entity Ids waiting to be saved
